strings.Value: "Pitax's attack is a boon for the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}. It's the perfect opportunity to expand your territories and not be taken as an aggressor."
"How could you say that?! No government's ambitions could justify the terrors of war! Can't you see that?!"
"Like spiders in a jar. All this fuss only lowers the veil over your mind... Like smoking, or wine."
"Are you prepared to risk our own kingdom, just for a chance to conquer another one? There's a reason they say there's a reckless gambler in every calculating strategist!"
"Are you prepared to risk our own kingdom, just for a chance to conquer another one? There's a reason they say there's a reckless gambler in every calculating strategist!"
